name: Petriq
description:
It's quite an ordinary day. The sun is shining and the clouds are sailing in the sky. The birds are singing and it's raining cats and dogs. Just the right time to make the right move. In principle the task is easy: connect four pets vertically, diagonally or horizontally and win. Beware your opponent is intelligent!

 
Petriq is a cute puzzle. It is a funny combination of traditional connect 4 game (= four in a row, four in a line, Captain's Mistress) and physics games. The IQ of AI is  between 100 - 145 (Pet IQ). Can you beat the Smartest Cat?
 
+ Global Leaderboard
+ Two Finger Johnny by Kevin MacLeod
+ Cats and Dogs by Franzi
